programme.title: Ubijanje Eve
programme.desc: Eve slavi rođendan i pokušava popraviti stvari s Nikom. Villanelle dobiva dobre vijesti o nadolazećem unapređenju, ali se ne može riješiti osjećaja da joj nešto u životu nedostaje. Eve slavi rođendan i pokušava popraviti stvari s Nikom. Villanelle dobiva dobre vijesti o nadolazećem unapređenju, ali se ne može riješiti osjećaja da joj nešto u životu nedostaje.

programme.title: Lake Placid 3
Jezero straha 3
programme.desc:
Lake Placid 3: Directed by Griff Furst. With Colin Ferguson, Yancy Butler, Kirsty Mitchell, Kacey Clarke. Killer crocodiles and their offspring terrorize residents of a small community." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1499249/","name":"Lake Placid 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZhMWJmYmItMDEwYy00ZTE4LTlkMzgtMzUzNDQ0Yjk2Mjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Killer crocodiles and their offspring terrorize residents of a small community.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1499249/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"paul_haakonsen"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not only the lake was placid here...","reviewBody":"Truth be told, I didn't even know there was a 2nd and 3rd movie to the "Lake Placid" movie, so I just came over the third movie by coincidence. So I sat down and watched it.

And then the terror began...

Oh. My. God! The CGI effects in this movie were so unbelievably poor. The crocodiles were among the crappiest CGI creatures I have seen in a long, long time. The intentions were good, but the effects were so lousy.

As for the story? Well nothing much to be expected here. You have a pretty basic "let's make a sequel" movie here. Local people and animals being eaten by monstrously big crocodiles, and a gun happy hunter is brought into the fray. And a family with troubles that somehow manages to save the day. It is all here. And it has all been seen before.

The acting, well it was wholeheartedly attempted, and actually most weren't too shabby. Some were questionable to say the least. But, of course, this is not an award winning movie, just another SyFy flick.

I managed to sit through it, but I was so tempted to get up and find something else. Which I should have done. This movie is not really entertaining, it is in the line of being ridiculous. But generally I sit through a movie once I started it. I think you have to be a really, REALLY hardcore fan of the first "Placid Lake" movie to actually fully enjoy this movie.

Well, at least it was an attempt at making a movie with giant crocodiles, it just didn't work out all that well. This is not a good choice to put on if you want to be entertained by a good wholesome movie with giant creatures. There are lots of other (and better) movies out there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4699,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-08-21","keywords":"female full frontal nudity,bare breasts,female pubic hair,panties pulled down,female removes her clothes","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272399/","name":"Colin Ferguson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000319/","name":"Yancy Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593511/","name":"Kirsty Mitchell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0975225/","name":"Griff Furst"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0320980/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080897/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3593780/","name":"David Reed"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

So I sat down and watched it.

And then the terror began...

Oh. My. God! The CGI effects in this movie were so unbelievably poor. The crocodiles were among the crappiest CGI creatures I have seen in a long, long time. The intentions were good, but the effects were so lousy.

As for the story? Well nothing much to be expected here. You have a pretty basic "let's make a sequel" movie here. Local people and animals being eaten by monstrously big crocodiles, and a gun happy hunter is brought into the fray. And a family with troubles that somehow manages to save the day. It is all here. And it has all been seen before.

The acting, well it was wholeheartedly attempted, and actually most weren't too shabby. Some were questionable to say the least. But, of course, this is not an award winning movie, just another SyFy flick.

I managed to sit through it, but I was so tempted to get up and find something else. Which I should have done. This movie is not really entertaining, it is in the line of being ridiculous. But generally I sit through a movie once I started it. I think you have to be a really, REALLY hardcore fan of the first "Placid Lake" movie to actually fully enjoy this movie.

Well, at least it was an attempt at making a movie with giant crocodiles, it just didn't work out all that well. This is not a good choice to put on if you want to be entertained by a good wholesome movie with giant creatures. There are lots of other (and better) movies out there.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4699,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-08-21","keywords":"female full frontal nudity,bare breasts,female pubic hair,panties pulled down,female removes her clothes","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272399/","name":"Colin Ferguson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000319/","name":"Yancy Butler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593511/","name":"Kirsty Mitchell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0975225/","name":"Griff Furst"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0320980/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080897/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3593780/","name":"David Reed"],"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: Kolekcija videobiografija najvećih holivudskih zvijezda. Emisija "Close Up" gledateljima pred malim ekranima donosi intervjue s najvećim hollywoodskim zvijezdama, ali i zanimljivosti vezane uz svijet filma. Uživajte uz zabavne i zanimljive minute ove biografske emisije!

programme.title: Interior
Teror
programme.desc: Interior: Directed by Marek Lechki. With Magdalena Poplawska, Piotr Zurawski, Tomasz Sapryk, Lech Mackiewicz. Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. He drives across the interior of Poland, where people are preparing for a celebration of an unspecified anniversary. In the meanwhile, Magda (35), a Town Hall employee in charge of the anniversary events, Highly committed at first, gradually notices all the dirt and corruption around her. At some point, she must choose between her career and integrity, whether she should accept it or risk her career and leave. Finally, on the celebration day, Maciek and Magda finally meet. programme.title: A Different Loyalty
Druga odanost
programme.desc:
A Different Loyalty: Directed by Marek Kanievska. With Sharon Stone, Rupert Everett, Julian Wadham, Michael Cochrane. British war reporter Leo and American journalist Sally meet on assignment in Beirut. When Leo disappears, Sally begins to uncover his secret life, which leads her behind the Iron Curtain and into the clutches of the KGB. In HD." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0326828/","name":"A Different Loyalty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg1OTVhMzItZjAzYi00Y2E1LTlhNTMtMTU3OTNkNDAwZjk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"British war reporter Leo and American journalist Sally meet on assignment in Beirut. When Leo disappears, Sally begins to uncover his secret life, which leads her behind the Iron Curtain and into the clutches of the KGB. In HD.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0326828/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HardToPlease"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't Believe the Packaging","reviewBody":"The DVD packaging describes this movies as a thriller, and as if to underline that, shows a picture of helicopters circling an exploding van while a guy with a gun runs away.

This movie is not a thriller, and there are no explosions or helicopters. (What was that on the packaging? Clip art?) When I'm in the mood for explosions and helicopters, it's a disappointment to bring home a movie that instead has as its big moments someone breaking down a door or fingerprinting someone.

This movie is a rambling, disjointed drama. It wasn't completely awful, but was like real life in that the story doesn't completely make sense and doesn't work artistically. (And if they'd shown one more Casablanca-esquire foggy airfield, I'd have screamed.) It's just a bunch of confusing stuff that happens, and then other stuff happens, and who cares about any of those people? And we spent the first 45 minutes trying to tell the various dark-haired women apart. Or maybe they were all the same woman. Still don't know.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-10-14","keywords":"flashback,spy,father son relationship,treason,englishman abroad","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Different Loyalty","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2075394329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzEwNWUzYWUtNDhjOC00MTAwLThkOTYtMDZlOGNhMWQxZGE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzEwNWUzYWUtNDhjOC00MTAwLThkOTYtMDZlOGNhMWQxZGE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000391/","name":"Rupert Everett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905554/","name":"Julian Wadham"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0437709/","name":"Marek Kanievska"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126277/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104832/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682063/","name":"Jim Piddock"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: L'heure d'été
Ljetni sati
programme.desc: L'heure d'été: Directed by Olivier Assayas. With Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling, Jérémie Renier, Edith Scob. Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0836700/","name":"L'heure d'été","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjU0Njc0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjcyNDY1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0836700/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"home-133"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Money or love?","reviewBody":"This is a haunting film about the distorting effects of monetary exchange on family life and the cohesion of society. It will give food for thought to anyone with elderly parents who may have accumulated a few works of art during their lifetime. At a time of grief, the bereaved have difficult questions to answer. The film-goer is left wondering, "What would I have done if I had been in a similar situation?" It is not a film to be quickly forgotten. Although the issue of the fate of the family's country house may be a specifically French theme, others dealt with are more universal and have a deep resonance for anyone with elderly relations. Juliette Binoche may be the name that draws film-goers in, but there is fine acting from all the performers.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7542,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2008-03-05","keywords":"family relationships,child,cigar smoking,climbing up a wall,memory","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Summer Hours","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi509412121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNDMzMjQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4OTY0Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNDMzMjQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4OTY0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075650/","name":"Charles Berling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0753737/","name":"Jérémie Renier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000801/","name":"Olivier Assayas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022545/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044140/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000801/","name":"Olivier Assayas"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0836700, Title: L'heure d'été, --- Description: L'heure d'été: Directed by Olivier Assayas. With Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling, Jérémie Renier, Edith Scob. Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0836700/","name":"L'heure d'été","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjU0Njc0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjcyNDY1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0836700/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"home-133","dateCreated":"2008-07-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Money or love?","reviewBody":"This is a haunting film about the distorting effects of monetary exchange on family life and the cohesion of society. It will give food for thought to anyone with elderly parents who may have accumulated a few works of art during their lifetime. At a time of grief, the bereaved have difficult questions to answer. The film-goer is left wondering, "What would I have done if I had been in a similar situation?" It is not a film to be quickly forgotten. Although the issue of the fate of the family's country house may be a specifically French theme, others dealt with are more universal and have a deep resonance for anyone with elderly relations. Juliette Binoche may be the name that draws film-goers in, but there is fine acting from all the performers.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7542,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2008-03-05","keywords":"family relationships,child,cigar smoking,climbing up a wall,memory","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Summer Hours","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi509412121","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNDMzMjQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4OTY0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNDMzMjQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4OTY0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession. programme.title: Playing by Heart
Playing by heart
programme.desc: Playing by Heart: Directed by Willard Carroll. With Angelina Jolie, Dennis Quaid, April Grace, Patricia Clarkson. Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145734/","name":"Playing by Heart","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTMxYmVmZTgtZjc5Yi00N2VmLThmNGUtOGNiM2QwODJmMzY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjUwNzk3NDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in Los Angeles.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145734/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sylenski"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Positively Charming . . .","reviewBody":"When I first came across this movie I was somewhat unconvinced by the blurb given on the back of the DVD. However, I decided to give it a chance any way (mostly due to the excellent ensemble cast) and I found that I was completely surprised - this movie was positively charming ! Granted, it is not without its slightly exaggerated moments but in the end this does nothing but add to its charm ! Angelina Jolie's character, Joan is delightful if somewhat melodramatic and Gillian Anderson does a great job as the relationship-shy Meredith enraptured with, yet afraid to commit to, the charismatic Trent. Sean Connery's performance is effortless and the rest of the cast are all excellent as well. There are light moments and completely heart-breaking moments but all in all - it ends on such a high note of hope that one cannot help but be delighted !\n\nDefinitely worth your time - 9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1999-01-22","keywords":"manhattan new york city,sister sister relationship,cheating,chicago illinois,divorce","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Playing By Heart","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3790577177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGM2ZDk3ZmUtNTUyYS00OTA3LTg1YjAtNzU2ODczMGJjYTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGM2ZDk3ZmUtNTUyYS00OTA3LTg1YjAtNzU2ODczMGJjYTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000096/","name":"Gillian Anderson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000995/","name":"Ellen Burstyn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000125/","name":"Sean Connery"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141033/","name":"Willard Carroll"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141033/","name":"Willard Carroll"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: xXx
xXx
programme.desc: xXx: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Vin Diesel, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas, Samuel L. Jackson. An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295701/","name":"xXx","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZjZmM1ZDctNDhlZi00Mzk1LWFjNWItYzIxNGY2OWYzYjJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295701/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"robjan1"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Turn off your brain and enjoy the ride...","reviewBody":"I would not dare to insult anyone's intelligence. With that said let me add, this movie will not insult yours, if you see it with the right attitude. Adrenaline pump set for full tilt boogie. This is not an intellectual movie, it is not a love story, and it certainly is not Rambo. What it is, is a series of action shorts connected by a common thread that is very much in vogue. Good guys vs. bad guys/terrorists and in so doing, overcome insurmountable odds to, 1. Do the " right thing " 2. Save the day, 3.Have a hell of a time doing it and 4. GET THE GIRL! If, you expect anymore than that, you will be disappointed. So, turn off you brain and enjoy the ride. If you enjoy extreme sports, action genre movies and bad guys with eastern european accents, sign up get ready to party. This is your movie! Oh, btw. Make sure you see this movie in a theatre that has GREAT sound. You will be rewarded."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-11","keywords":"snowboard,time bomb,kidnapping,tattoo on torso,adventure hero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi451084569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000782/","name":"Asia Argento"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Piranha 3DD
Piranja 3DD
programme.desc:
Piranha 3DD: Directed by John Gulager. With Danielle Panabaker, Matt Bush, Katrina Bowden, Jean-Luc Bilodeau. After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1714203/","name":"Piranha 3DD","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAzMzY4NTk0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDA4ODU3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1714203/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eelen-seth"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Double the D's, half the fun","reviewBody":"Double the D's, not even half the fun.

"Piranha 3DD" follows where the previous finished. After the events at Lake Victoria, the pre-historic school of blood-thirsty piranhas make their way into a newly opened waterpark.

You know, when you're about to watch this kind of movie that you don't have to expect too much and just enjoy the ride. The first 'Piranha'-remake kinda accomplished that. This one started okay - a scene where Gary Busey is looking for his lost cow in the water, turns into an unexpected funny gag. But after we know in which direction this film is taking us - an 'Adults only'-pool with water certified strippers - and the awful acting of several supporting cast members, I knew this wasn't gonna be the good-kinda-bad. 

Sadly "Piranha 3DD" is more boring than its predecessor and could've been more, if you look at the original 'Piranha' sequel (directed by James Cameron himself). This one just lacks originality. The director has no idea how to handle this and you can tell in the second half of this film. It's not a comedy nor a self-parody or horror.

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc:
Battle: Los Angeles: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Aaron Eckhart, Ramon Rodriguez, Will Rothhaar, Cory Hardrict. A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1217613/","name":"Battle: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg2NzQwOGMtMGRkNC00YjAwLTg4NjgtZWQwYzljZmM1YzA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1217613/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sstallion"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally ... What I wanted to see after I watched the trailer for Skyline !!!!","reviewBody":"I went into this movie with low expectations after the relative disappointment which was skyline, a film that promised so much from the trailer and delivered far less.

However, im glad to say any misgivings I had were quickly expelled. Now don't get me wrong, this isn't the greatest film ever made, and in many ways it fails to hold a candle to the likes of independence day, which in my opinion is one of the greatest films of its type ever made. It does however, bring a much more up close and personal aspect to an alien invasion. Its more like watching a war filmed in Iraq or something, but that in itself is what separates it from a muddle of recent alien invasion movies that fails to ignite any kind of fire in the mind.

The film moves at an unrelenting pace, with good action sequences and cgi to boot, its predictable at times and the ending fails to come up with something clever or original, but hey ... you cant have everything !!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-03-11","keywords":"invasion,alien invasion,extraterrestrial,male lieutenant,wounded man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Battle: Los Angeles - Nothing Can Prepare You","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3897661977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch an exclusive trailer for the new film Battle: Los Angeles."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078203/","name":"Christopher Bertolini"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The Sweetest Thing: Directed by Roger Kumble. With Lillian Adams, Herbert W. Ankrom, Bryan Anthony, Christina Applegate. A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0253867/","name":"The Sweetest Thing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIyZTkwOGEtYTFlNC00MTU4LWIyNGItYjBlYmFhNDRmYzcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0253867/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Caitlin-Em"},"dateCreated":"2003-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Devastatingly Dumb---and Fun ^_^","reviewBody":"While not meant to be taken at all seriously, The Sweetest Thing is a great movie to watch with the gals when you're looking for something light and funny. It's almost like the female There's Something About Mary; it has a lot of bathroom humor, which I usually am not really amused by, but this works, and it's basically just about three best friends just being happy, which is a nice message for a change. I couldn't believe the things in it, though, since I thought the movie was PG-13 the first time I watched it. O_o The best touch is that it's slightly absurd, like Wet Hot American Summer, which brings in more attention and unparalleled amusement. Highly recommended for girls--they'd enjoy it a lot more than guys...it's the Rated R Chick Flick.\n\n7/10--rather silly, but cute and feel good all the same ^_^","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":57736,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-04-12","keywords":"woman in a men's room,glory hole,roommate,female removes her dress,pick up line","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Sweetest Thing","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1509622041","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNhNzM4OGMtYTkwZi00MWExLTg4NDUtYTIwZTZiOTE3MWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNhNzM4OGMtYTkwZi00MWExLTg4NDUtYTIwZTZiOTE3MWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005048/","name":"Thomas Jane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000775/","name":"Christina Applegate"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474955/","name":"Roger Kumble"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010901/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683726/","name":"Nancy M. Action Jackson: Directed by Craig R. Baxley. With Carl Weathers, Craig T. Nelson, Vanity, Sharon Stone. Vengence drives a tough Detroit cop to stay on the trail of a power hungry auto magnate who's systematically eliminating his competition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0094612/","name":"Action Jackson","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFhNmI3OWQtOTU5Zi00ODA3LWExNjctMTllZWE2ZGE3ZTA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Vengence drives a tough Detroit cop to stay on the trail of a power hungry auto magnate who's systematically eliminating his competition.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094612/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mr-Fusion"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A never-mentioned gem","reviewBody":"A late-'80s action movie directed by a stunt man (and all that that implies!)

No one's pretending "Action Jackson" is high art, but man is it fun. The only guns Carl Weathers needs to fight crime are his rippling biceps. Throw in the wickedly evil Craig T. Nelson and a couple of foxy supporting ladies, and baby you got a stew going (couldn't help the Arrested Development reference). 

This has all of the tropes of the period, plus a healthy dose of blaxploitation; and it's a potent mixture. Not to mention the wide range of stunts. Let me put it another way; a bad guy is thrown out of the window of one building ... and through the window of another one! programme.title: Interior
Teror
programme.desc: Interior: Directed by Marek Lechki. With Magdalena Poplawska, Piotr Zurawski, Tomasz Sapryk, Lech Mackiewicz. Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. He drives across the interior of Poland, where people are preparing for a celebration of an unspecified anniversary. In the meanwhile, Magda (35), a Town Hall employee in charge of the anniversary events, Highly committed at first, gradually notices all the dirt and corruption around her. At some point, she must choose between her career and integrity, whether she should accept it or risk her career and leave. Finally, on the celebration day, Maciek and Magda finally meet. Will it change anything for them?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10665734/","name":"Interior","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODliNTA0M2MtZDA2Ni00OGJlLTg2Y2ItYWIzOTY0YzIwMjcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. programme.title: L'heure d'été
Ljetni sati
programme.desc: L'heure d'été: Directed by Olivier Assayas. With Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling, Jérémie Renier, Edith Scob. Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0836700/","name":"L'heure d'été","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjU0Njc0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjcyNDY1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0836700/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"home-133"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Money or love?","reviewBody":"This is a haunting film about the distorting effects of monetary exchange on family life and the cohesion of society. It will give food for thought to anyone with elderly parents who may have accumulated a few works of art during their lifetime. At a time of grief, the bereaved have difficult questions to answer. The film-goer is left wondering, "What would I have done if I had been in a similar situation?" It is not a film to be quickly forgotten. Although the issue of the fate of the family's country house may be a specifically French theme, others dealt with are more universal and have a deep resonance for anyone with elderly relations. Juliette Binoche may be the name that draws film-goers in, but there is fine acting from all the performers.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7542,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2008-03-05","keywords":"family relationships,child,cigar smoking,climbing up a wall,memory","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Summer Hours","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi509412121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNDMzMjQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4OTY0Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNDMzMjQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4OTY0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two brothers and a sister witness the disappearance of their childhood memories when they must relinquish the family belongings to ensure their deceased mother's succession. Overscheduled and running late, her parents can't pick her up on time on the last day of school before Christmas break. programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
Gospodin i gospođa Smith
programme.desc:
Mr. & Mrs. Smith: Directed by Doug Liman. With Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody. A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0356910/","name":"Mr. & Mrs. Smith","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMzcxNzQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzQxNjUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0356910/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carljessieson"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining as Hell!","reviewBody":"This is a daaaamn fun movie! Heh. To all the critics, yes, there are a lot of explosions, gunfire, unrealistic battles, plenty of times where you think "they MUST have been hit by a bullet by now..there is noo effin way...", and over-dramatized violence, but there's plenty of good stuff too that should not be ignored.

Probably the best part about this movie is the couple. I know it's been said before, but it's so true that I'm gonna repeat: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie have incredible chemistry. It's no wonder they're still together today. Even when the movie couple, John and Jane Smith, where in their "off period" of marriage, you could feel something between the two. They are an amazing screen couple, they work incredibly well together. Their dialogue is just right...when one says something to the other, it's smooth and real. And of course, Pitt and Jolie are both extremely attractive, so they're fun to watch. Haha.

The plot is all right..nothing extraordinary. It's a typical action movie plot, simple enough to leave plenty of room for the battle shots and violence. Nothing special. The dialogue wasn't bad, it wasn't lame action movie words. No stupid puns or anything. There was really nice cinematography, some shots that really were stunning. Usually the emotional aspect of action movies is dense and easy, cliché and boring, but I liked it in this movie. You could tell that they really loved each other, yet at the same time were committed to their jobs. You could feel the conflict.

I own this movie and I'm glad I do. It's a good time. I recommend it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":472960,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-06-08","keywords":"secret agent,character names as title,desert,surname in title,wife hits husband","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mr. and Mrs. Smith","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2627141913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjIyNjItZTFkMy00M2IwLTkxNjItNmM1YjQ2YzM1OWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjIyNjItZTFkMy00M2IwLTkxNjItNmM1YjQ2YzM1OWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111013/","name":"Adam Brody"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093488/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0356910, Title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith, --- Description: Mr. & Mrs. Smith: Directed by Doug Liman. With Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody. A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0356910/","name":"Mr. & Mrs. Smith","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMzcxNzQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzQxNjUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0356910/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"carljessieson","dateCreated":"2010-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining as Hell!","reviewBody":"This is a daaaamn fun movie! Heh. To all the critics, yes, there are a lot of explosions, gunfire, unrealistic battles, plenty of times where you think "they MUST have been hit by a bullet by now..there is noo effin way...", and over-dramatized violence, but there's plenty of good stuff too that should not be ignored.

Probably the best part about this movie is the couple. I know it's been said before, but it's so true that I'm gonna repeat: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie have incredible chemistry. It's no wonder they're still together today. Even when the movie couple, John and Jane Smith, where in their "off period" of marriage, you could feel something between the two. They are an amazing screen couple, they work incredibly well together. Their dialogue is just right...when one says something to the other, it's smooth and real. And of course, Pitt and Jolie are both extremely attractive, so they're fun to watch. Haha.

The plot is all right..nothing extraordinary. It's a typical action movie plot, simple enough to leave plenty of room for the battle shots and violence. Nothing special. The dialogue wasn't bad, it wasn't lame action movie words. No stupid puns or anything. There was really nice cinematography, some shots that really were stunning. Usually the emotional aspect of action movies is dense and easy, cliché and boring, but I liked it in this movie. You could tell that they really loved each other, yet at the same time were committed to their jobs. You could feel the conflict.

I own this movie and I'm glad I do. It's a good time. I recommend it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":472960,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-06-08","keywords":"secret agent,character names as title,desert,surname in title,wife hits husband","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mr. and Mrs. Smith","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2627141913","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjIyNjItZTFkMy00M2IwLTkxNjItNmM1YjQ2YzM1OWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjIyNjItZTFkMy00M2IwLTkxNjItNmM1YjQ2YzM1OWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111013/","name":"Adam Brody"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093488/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
Starsky i Hutch
programme.desc:
Starsky & Hutch: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg, Fred Williamson. Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0335438/","name":"Starsky & Hutch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU2NTQ1NTkxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTE1MTEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0335438/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"toffeesi"},"dateCreated":"2007-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Sunday Hangover Film","reviewBody":"Hand on heart I did not want to watch this film. Although I grew up with the TV series and really enjoyed it, when the film was released I have to say that I was not keen, I can not put my finger on why, perhaps it was Stiller, who, Something About Mary apart, has never really done it for me. But what ever the reason, it remained unveiwed.

That was 2004 - Xmas 2006 and I get DVD vouchers, so In the January sales off I go to see what I can get, I do quite well, but have £3 remaining, I have 2 or 3 to chose from 2 I have already seen, and Starsky & Hutch.....So I bought it.......yet still it was unwatched until yesterday.......hungover and feeling a little lazy I needed something to pass the time that was easy to watch, funny, and not too taxing.....so on it goes.

How surprised was I then when after only a few minutes I was giggling away. Stiller was actually entertaining and I was enjoying watching him, Mr Wilson was very good and I got the vibe that the characters gelled as the ones in the TV series did. Vaughan was a good baddie, and Snoop was hight entertaining if not as camp Huggy Bear! All in all this is a good solid comedy film, not brilliant don't get me wrong, but worth a watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143897,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-04-06","keywords":"character names as title,buddy movie,night club,1970s,russian roulette","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Starsky & Hutch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi25887001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q2NjI1OTYtMDJiNy00MDY2LWE0Y2EtY2E5ZDI2NTZjODU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q2NjI1OTYtMDJiNy00MDY2LWE0Y2EtY2E5ZDI2NTZjODU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004879/","name":"Snoop Dogg"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0175068/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088479/","name":"William Blinn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192866/","name":"Stevie Long"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1016088/","name":"John O'Brien"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by Jigsaw." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1233227/","name":"Saw VI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NDA3MTM4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTY4Njg3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent Strahm is dead, and FBI agent Erickson draws nearer to Hoffman. Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by Jigsaw.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1233227/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Movieboy_20"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly good","reviewBody":"Finally, the Saw series has regained some of it's previous credibility. Saw VI proved to be a very bloody, but clever mainstream romp.

There were a couple of great twists and turns, the gore was jacked up to a fantastic level of brutal extremity (easily beating the rather tame 5th installment), and most importantly, I, plus everyone in the theatre had a ball with it.

As well as being a valid continuation of the 'Saw' story, it worked well as a standalone film. The main twist actually had nothing do to with the previous movies... but don't get me wrong, you'll get plenty of answers for questions left open from the other films at the same time.

As you'd expect, the acting and production values weren't to flash, but the good screenplay and balls-out sadistic torture made this a vast improvement over the last couple of sequels. Apart from the first, I'm happy to say this is definitely one of my favorites from the series. 7.5/10.

Check it out. I'm glad my curiosity won out over the bad press. This movie was compelling, suspenseful, and well acted. J-lo is believable in her role and gives an impressive performance.\n\nI was uncomfortable through nearly the entire movie; one of the marks of an excellent suspense/drama. The importance of the topic of this movie should be enough to encourage people to see it but it is not for the faint of heart. The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ladywriter56"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good","reviewBody":"After reading all the negative reviews on this I'm wondering what exactly does today's audience want in a cop series? More sex, language, unreal car chases? Less plot and enough action sequences in one episode to give your brain an epileptic seizure? After getting hooked on fun, entertaining shows like The Good Cop and Battle Creek only to have them cancelled after one season, I give up trying to figure out today's viewers. No, LA's Finest isn't perfect (or totally realistic, but hey, what show is?). Yet it's pretty engaging. The story lines keep me coming back for more episodes and I think the acting is pretty good. More sex, language, unreal car chases? Less plot and enough action sequences in one episode to give your brain an epileptic seizure? After getting hooked on fun, entertaining shows like The Good Cop and Battle Creek only to have them cancelled after one season, I give up trying to figure out today's viewers. No, LA's Finest isn't perfect (or totally realistic, but hey, what show is?). Yet it's pretty engaging. The story lines keep me coming back for more episodes and I think the acting is pretty good. But what do I know?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6638,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2019-05-13","keywords":"location in series title,female police officer,female police detective,buddy cop,police partner police partner relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004695/","name":"Jessica Alba","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0552222/","name":"Duane Martin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0746691/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0354076/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2474120/","name":"Brandon Margolis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1228961/","name":"Brandon Sonnier"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi100121881","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcwMDdiNGEtNmM5Mi00NDgwLThmMDAtN2VkYmU1YzAzZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcwMDdiNGEtNmM5Mi00NDgwLThmMDAtN2VkYmU1YzAzZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Breed
The Shield
programme.desc: The Breed: Directed by Nicholas Mastandrea. With Michelle Rodriguez, Oliver Hudson, Taryn Manning, Eric Lively. A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. This is enjoyable for what it is, but it's nothing special.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2008-01-30","keywords":"island,cabin in the woods,animal attack,survival,natural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Breed (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1938424089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005029/","name":"Oliver Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557608/","name":"Nicholas Mastandrea"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148083/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176256/","name":"Robert Conte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941810/","name":"Peter Wortmann"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Totalcar
programme.desc: Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije! Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"timmurphy-2"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid Show","reviewBody":"Look...no network TV show is going to be totally accurate. This isn't a documentary. I was a JAG and that TV show wasn't even close to being accurate. But it WAS entertaining. And, like this show, it captures the spirit and fellowship of a tight military team. Whoever these folks are dissing the show I have news for you...women play vital roles in our armed services. The contribution here is fairly accurate from what I understand. This is entertaining, it's patriotic and it honors the men and women in the front lines of the war on terror. I also appreciate that it attempts to highlight the sacrifices of the family members supporting our servicemen and servicewomen. As a veteran and the father of two servicemen, I thank CBS for a pretty solid and interesting show. Thanks for honoring the best America has to offer.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"timmurphy-2","dateCreated":"2017-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid Show","reviewBody":"Look...no network TV show is going to be totally accurate. This isn't a documentary. I was a JAG and that TV show wasn't even close to being accurate. But it WAS entertaining. And, like this show, it captures the spirit and fellowship of a tight military team. Whoever these folks are dissing the show I have news for you...women play vital roles in our armed services. The contribution here is fairly accurate from what I understand. This is entertaining, it's patriotic and it honors the men and women in the front lines of the war on terror. I also appreciate that it attempts to highlight the sacrifices of the family members supporting our servicemen and servicewomen. As a veteran and the father of two servicemen, I thank CBS for a pretty solid and interesting show. programme.title: Inside Out
Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc:
Inside Out: Directed by Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen. With Amy Poehler, Phyllis Smith, Richard Kind, Bill Hader. After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2096673/","name":"Inside Out","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgxMDQwMDk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjU5OTg2NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2096673/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Heinzwill"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beyond Words...","reviewBody":"It's been nearly a year since I first saw this film. I would say I had pretty low knowledge in films before I first saw Inside Out (not to say that I'm highly intelligent on films now). I only saw about 200 films prior. I hadn't seen a lot of classic films or even know that film can be an art form just through its camera work among other aspects. So you could say that I can't speak for everyone on my views of this film. And you may be right because opinions are subjective anyway.

This is my favourite film ever.

Like I said above, I didn't see a lot of films that were deemed as masterpieces at that time. While I still have a lot more to see, I can say that I have caught up with many notable ones now. I've seen The Godfather. I've seen 2001: A Space Odyssey. I've seen Casablanca. I've seen The Shawshank Redemption. I've seen Pulp Fiction. I've seen Lawrence of Arabia.

Yet this is still my favourite film of all-time.

80 years from now, this won't change. I felt something extraordinary that will never be felt again. This to me, was a revelation. In honest words I've never experienced something like this before. Only because of Inside Out I was able to kick myself off of a serious depression I had for years, understand the meaning of feeling, feel sympathy to why people act the way they do, be interested in films. In fact, I went and watched the films I mentioned above because of Inside Out.

Ever since that late July of 2015 I had been compulsively obsessed with Inside Out to the point where I checked its Oscar chances, IMDb rating, Rotten Tomatoes rating and box office grosses to the point where I felt like I had to stop myself from doing as when seeing anything negative about it just makes feel let down and quite sad about it. It's still something that I'm trying to quit but obviously it's not going that well (ie. this review after one year of the film's release).

Inside Out taught me more about depression, empathy, importance of sorrow and interpersonal relationships than any books, talk shows, real-life stories or cat posters could ever dream of. It made me want to become a filmmaker because if this much craft and intelligence can be put in a film, then sign me up to the industry because I want to be a part of it. I don't want to talk about the story or the technical aspects of Inside Out because everyone has talked about it already.

In the course of less than ten months, I've see this film six times. That's more than any other film during the same period. It's a true testament to its strength and impact on me that's hardly ever going to fade away. I know this isn't the case for everybody. I keep trying to find anybody else who had the same experience as I did walking out of this film for the first time. I yielded only little results and although it brings me down a little since I don't really have anyone else to relate to, I keep telling myself, that no matter what happens to Inside Out in the future, whether its Rotten Tomatoes score or IMDb rating or its overall stature among the general public, whether it gets worse or better for it, this will always be favourite film of all-time. Nothing will change that and I have to let go of everybody else's opinion whether or not they had similar emotional experiences towards it.

You can vote "not helpful" on this review all you want (which seems to be a recurring case for all positive user reviews here.... I wonder why...) but it's not going to matter anyway. This is a beautiful film that will resonate in me always.

I will never forget Inside Out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":660021,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-06-17","keywords":"joy,sadness,anger,memory,running away","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"In Theaters: June 19","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi203730969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNDg5MjEwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQyNDM5NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNDg5MjEwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQyNDM5NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Inside Out is in theaters on June 19!"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688132/","name":"Amy Poehler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352778/","name":"Bill Hader"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085400/","name":"Lewis Black"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215455/","name":"Ronnie Del Carmen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215455/","name":"Ronnie Del Carmen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498834/","name":"Meg LeFauve"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

Nakon pljačke i pucnjave u ilegalnom noćnom klubu, Hondo i njegov tim sumnjaju da je Diego Pascal iz bande 20th Street Diablos ukrao zlato koje je pripadalo kartelu. Diego je u bijegu nakon što su mu ubili partnera i sada tim traži Reyu, konobaricu iz kluba koja je također nestala nakon što su je ranili u ruku.

programme.title: The Shield
programme.desc: Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom... Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom, specijalnom policijom koja se koristi nezakonitim metodama u borbi protiv kriminala, ali vrlo učinkovitim.

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

credits.actor: Nathan Fillion, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Titus Makin Jr., Mercedes Mason, Melissa O'Neil, Afton Williamson, Eric Winter

programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"timmurphy-2"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid Show","reviewBody":"Look...no network TV show is going to be totally accurate. This isn't a documentary. I was a JAG and that TV show wasn't even close to being accurate. But it WAS entertaining. And, like this show, it captures the spirit and fellowship of a tight military team. Whoever these folks are dissing the show I have news for you...women play vital roles in our armed services. The contribution here is fairly accurate from what I understand. This is entertaining, it's patriotic and it honors the men and women in the front lines of the war on terror. I also appreciate that it attempts to highlight the sacrifices of the family members supporting our servicemen and servicewomen. As a veteran and the father of two servicemen, I thank CBS for a pretty solid and interesting show. IMDb data; ttnr: 6473344, Title: SEAL Team, --- Description: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"timmurphy-2","dateCreated":"2017-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid Show","reviewBody":"Look...no network TV show is going to be totally accurate. This isn't a documentary. I was a JAG and that TV show wasn't even close to being accurate. But it WAS entertaining. And, like this show, it captures the spirit and fellowship of a tight military team. Whoever these folks are dissing the show I have news for you...women play vital roles in our armed services. The contribution here is fairly accurate from what I understand. This is entertaining, it's patriotic and it honors the men and women in the front lines of the war on terror. I also appreciate that it attempts to highlight the sacrifices of the family members supporting our servicemen and servicewomen. programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"timmurphy-2"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid Show","reviewBody":"Look...no network TV show is going to be totally accurate. This isn't a documentary. I was a JAG and that TV show wasn't even close to being accurate. But it WAS entertaining. And, like this show, it captures the spirit and fellowship of a tight military team. Whoever these folks are dissing the show I have news for you...women play vital roles in our armed services. The contribution here is fairly accurate from what I understand. This is entertaining, it's patriotic and it honors the men and women in the front lines of the war on terror. I also appreciate that it attempts to highlight the sacrifices of the family members supporting our servicemen and servicewomen. As a veteran and the father of two servicemen, I thank CBS for a pretty solid and interesting show. Thanks for honoring the best America has to offer.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Gran Hotel: With Adriana Ozores, Amaia Salamanca, Yon González, Eloy Azorín. programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.Uz napete trenutke ove serije, saznajte ishod tajnih misija ovih hrabrih vojnika!

programme.title: Tehnološke Igračke
programme.desc: Dokumentarna serija "Tehnološke igračke" vodi vas u svijet tehnologije, upoznaje gledatelje pred malim ekranima s mnogim prometnim inovacijama. Dokumentarna serija "Tehnološke igračke" vodi vas u svijet tehnologije, upoznaje gledatelje pred malim ekranima s mnogim prometnim inovacijama. Zajedno otputujte u svijet visoke tehnologije u kojoj možete otkriti niz revolucionarnih izuma i vozila iz budućnosti. Ako ste ljubitelj tehnologije, opustite se i uživajte u ovoj seriji!
