programme.title: Changing Lanes
Kobno prestrojavanje
programme.desc:
Changing Lanes: Directed by Roger Michell. With Ben Affleck, Samuel L. Jackson, Kim Staunton, Toni Collette. A young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident, and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0264472/","name":"Changing Lanes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjNiMGEwZTAtNDc4Yy00MjcwLWE4ODktNzdkNGEwY2Q0NWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident, and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0264472/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mattymatt4ever"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something different; Something good","reviewBody":"Now, I'm not going to slap this movie on my Top 10 list or say it deserves an Oscar nod, like many critics have exclaimed, but I will say it's something different. First of all, it's real. Not an artificial Hollywood shoot 'em up or disaster flick. This is a film about the human struggle. There's no violence or sex, and if it weren't for about 7 uses of the "f" word "Changing Lanes" could've easily earned a PG-13. So don't let the R-rating fool you.

There are three main reasons why I checked out this movie: Samuel, L, Jackson. Needless to say, he's a terrific actor and worth seeing in whatever he does. He's one of my favorites, and he delivers another powerhouse performance, taking on a role somewhat different from his recent roles: he plays an average Joe. We're introduced to his character, Doyle Gibson, who's a very nice guy simply haunted by mistakes in his past, one being alcoholism, which led to a divorce. And now he's attending AA meetings and buying a house for his two kids, hoping he will attain custody of them. Ben Affleck is good and charismatic. I didn't sympathize as much with his character, but that doesn't make him an antagonist. Neither characters are saints, nor are they sinners. That's good, because it's never completely effective to include characters who are entirely sympathetic. They're both mature adults, but they resort to juvenile acts of revenge in hopes that they can undo what happened. Sydney Pollack is great, as Affleck's egotistical father-in-law, proving his talents in front of the camera are just as fine as his talents behind the camera. I wanted to see more of the beautiful Amanda Peet, but she only has approximately 7 minutes of screen time. So I'm guessing that topless scene I heard mentioned didn't make it to the final cut. Oh, well. William Hurt, who seems to do a movie every 5 years, unfortunately has a small, thankless role as an alcohol counselor.

The script is well-written, and the film is a lot more character-driven than ones of recent years. I loved that scene in the bar where Sam Jackson sits in a lonely bar, listening in on two white guys badmouthing Tiger Woods. He lashes back with a terrific monologue, and later ends up punching them out. Some directors would've cut that scene out, overly concerned about the film's pacing, but I'm glad this time that wasn't the case. However, the ending seems a little fake. It's just too happy for its own good. But that's the only element of the movie I found forced.

My score: 7 (out of 10)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70496,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-04","keywords":"road rage,lawyer,feud,revenge,car accident","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Changing Lanes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1824325913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTBiODZiYzAtNDFmYy00ZDEzLWJjMTQtOTFhNGQ2ZDQxNzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTBiODZiYzAtNDFmYy00ZDEzLWJjMTQtOTFhNGQ2ZDQxNzk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Paramount"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0823940/","name":"Kim Staunton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0585011/","name":"Roger Michell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093765/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852105/","name":"Chap Taylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0866062/","name":"Michael Tolkin"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

Oh, well. William Hurt, who seems to do a movie every 5 years, unfortunately has a small, thankless role as an alcohol counselor.

The script is well-written, and the film is a lot more character-driven than ones of recent years. I loved that scene in the bar where Sam Jackson sits in a lonely bar, listening in on two white guys badmouthing Tiger Woods. He lashes back with a terrific monologue, and later ends up punching them out. Some directors would've cut that scene out, overly concerned about the film's pacing, but I'm glad this time that wasn't the case. However, the ending seems a little fake. It's just too happy for its own good. But that's the only element of the movie I found forced.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
Uhvati me ako možeš
programme.desc:
Catch Me If You Can: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen. Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0264464/","name":"Catch Me If You Can","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5MzYzNjc5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTUyNTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0264464/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jotix100"},"dateCreated":"2003-01-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Witty con man.","reviewBody":"From the opening credits design we get in the mood of this very entertaining film. They create the tone for what will follow. Steven Spielberg is in rare form directing this movie that doesn't have a dull moment.

Mr. Spielberg has found a perfect actor to fill the shoes of the con man with the perfect casting of Leonardo DiCaprio. It's very easy to see why all the women fall prey of this charmer. He was a fast talker and a slick operator. He exudes charisma to fill another couple of movies.

 It's a welcome sight to have Mr. DiCaprio working in a vehicle that shows his talent as Frank Abagnale, a man of many faces. He plays a game of hide-and-seek throughout the movie with Hanratty, the FBI agent that is in his trail. Tom Hanks shows great assurance and gusto with this character. Of course, the DiCaprio magnetism dominates the action with the many ironic twists and the miraculous and narrow escapes he pulls with an aplomb that's bewildering to the Feds, who are on his tail all the time.

The minor roles are equally important. Christopher Walken as the father starts out as the prototype of the con man, but he's too decent to do wrong; his business fails eventually. His marriage to Natalie Baye, the fine French actress, ends in divorce because obviously she hates being married to a loser.

The action doesn't stop for one moment. This film is great fun to watch with the winning combination Mr. Spielberg assured hand gives us this time out. Mr. Spielberg can thank the genial Mr. DiCaprio who responds obviously to his direction and makes this con man endearing even when he is committing crimes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":902317,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-01-15","keywords":"impostor,con,race against time,deception,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Catch Me If You Can","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1220346137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQxM2UxZTUtMzFlZS00YTVjLWFkNzctZjQzZjMwN2ZlNTllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWQxM2UxZTUtMzFlZS00YTVjLWFkNzctZjQzZjMwN2ZlNTllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Dreamworks"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000138/","name":"Leonardo DiCaprio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0084134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0112912/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0622288/","name":"Jeff Nathanson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007646/","name":"Frank Abagnale Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1127221/","name":"Stan Redding"}],"duration":"PT2H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: RED 2
Red 2
programme.desc: RED 2: Directed by Dean Parisot. With Bruce Willis, John Malkovich, Mary-Louise Parker, Helen Mirren. Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1821694/","name":"RED 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2ODQ4ODY3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc2NzE1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1821694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A refreshing action comedy","reviewBody":"This film is about the missions of a bunch of retired ex-spies who are still extremely dangerous.\n\nIt's refreshing to have an action comedy! It's not easy to have all the killings and explosions happening, and yet maintaining a light hearted and fun tone. "Red 2" succeeds again in reaching the balance, making it enjoyable and fun. There are many cool scenes such as Helen Mirren firing guns with both hands towards opposite directions from a car. Mary Louise Parker's character is also fun, she seems not to know how to do anything but she is still so cool and funny. It's nice to see an action film having a big female presence, it's such a pleasant change. All the characters I enjoyed watching "Red 2", and maybe there will be another sequel?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":166619,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-07-19","keywords":"color in title,reference to las vegas nevada,time bomb,cranberry,dc comics","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3200493849","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MjIwMjU5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgzODMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MjIwMjU5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgzODMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000518/","name":"John Malkovich"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0661751/","name":"Dean Parisot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388377/","name":"Jon Hoeber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388375/","name":"Erich Hoeber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1979137/","name":"Warren Ellis"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
Alien: Savez
programme.desc:
Alien: Covenant: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Michael Fassbender, Katherine Waterston, Billy Crudup, Danny McBride. The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2316204/","name":"Alien: Covenant","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzVkMjRhNzctOGQxMC00OGE2LWJhN2EtNmYyODRiMDNlM2ZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2316204/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Endless_01"},"dateCreated":"2017-05-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An entertaining, brutal and very confusing sequel.","reviewBody":"Okay, I'll tell the truth. I did not expect much from the sequel to Promethues, as it seemed that the level of the Alien films declined more and more, but this time, It was quite different.

The film has no doubt, the most beautiful views we see in the saga of Alien, has some incredible special effects, a very good script, spectacular performances (Fassbender is incredible) an entertaining plot, good sound design, great visuals And a lot, a lot of blood. I think it is the most bloody and violent film in the entire saga, just like the first time I saw Aliens, this one left me shocked and I try to see again and again.

I am a big fan of science fiction and horror, Alien is my favorite saga, I must say that I am very grateful to Scott for the fantastic thing that is this new movie, very incredible, no doubt, it was quite entertaining and intense to experiment it in cinema. But, perhaps one of its biggest mistakes is its strange and too confusing narrative on the part of the director; this film is supposed to be designed to give answers to past problems, to the questions that we have asked ourselves so much, however, it only ends up reeling over themselves and trying to add layer upon layer of complexity that simply end up being unnecessary overexposure.

Leaving that aside, it was a quite entertaining movie, with intense scenes and wonderful shots. I also highlight the incredible performance of Fassbender. Simple and fascinating I can describe it.

Something interesting that I should highlight; Hell, this movie is brutal.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":268946,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-05-12","keywords":"xenomorph,android,alien,future,stasis","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Alien: Covenant","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4288987161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWYwMDJhOGMtMDI1YS00Y2NiLTg2NWMtZmRmOTU2ZGJhZjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWYwMDJhOGMtMDI1YS00Y2NiLTg2NWMtZmRmOTU2ZGJhZjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Alien: Covenant"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2239702/","name":"Katherine Waterston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001082/","name":"Billy Crudup"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639321/","name":"Dan O'Bannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795953/","name":"Ronald Shusett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1438698/","name":"Jack Paglen"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2316204, Title: Alien: Covenant, --- Description: Alien: Covenant: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Michael Fassbender, Katherine Waterston, Billy Crudup, Danny McBride. The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2316204/","name":"Alien: Covenant","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzVkMjRhNzctOGQxMC00OGE2LWJhN2EtNmYyODRiMDNlM2ZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2316204/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Endless_01","dateCreated":"2017-05-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An entertaining, brutal and very confusing sequel.","reviewBody":"Okay, I'll tell the truth. I did not expect much from the sequel to Promethues, as it seemed that the level of the Alien films declined more and more, but this time, It was quite different.

The film has no doubt, the most beautiful views we see in the saga of Alien, has some incredible special effects, a very good script, spectacular performances (Fassbender is incredible) an entertaining plot, good sound design, great visuals And a lot, a lot of blood. I think it is the most bloody and violent film in the entire saga, just like the first time I saw Aliens, this one left me shocked and I try to see again and again.

I am a big fan of science fiction and horror, Alien is my favorite saga, I must say that I am very grateful to Scott for the fantastic thing that is this new movie, very incredible, no doubt, it was quite entertaining and intense to experiment it in cinema. But, perhaps one of its biggest mistakes is its strange and too confusing narrative on the part of the director; this film is supposed to be designed to give answers to past problems, to the questions that we have asked ourselves so much, however, it only ends up reeling over themselves and trying to add layer upon layer of complexity that simply end up being unnecessary overexposure.

Leaving that aside, it was a quite entertaining movie, with intense scenes and wonderful shots. I also highlight the incredible performance of Fassbender. Simple and fascinating I can describe it.

Something interesting that I should highlight; Hell, this movie is brutal.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":268946,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-05-12","keywords":"xenomorph,android,alien,future,stasis","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Alien: Covenant","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4288987161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWYwMDJhOGMtMDI1YS00Y2NiLTg2NWMtZmRmOTU2ZGJhZjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWYwMDJhOGMtMDI1YS00Y2NiLTg2NWMtZmRmOTU2ZGJhZjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Alien: Covenant","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2239702/","name":"Katherine Waterston","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001082/","name":"Billy Crudup"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639321/","name":"Dan O'Bannon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795953/","name":"Ronald Shusett","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1438698/","name":"Jack Paglen"],"duration":"PT2H2M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
Resident Evil: Osveta
programme.desc: Resident Evil: Retribution: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Michelle Rodriguez, Aryana Engineer. Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1855325/","name":"Resident Evil: Retribution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0NjcwMWMtN2MyNC00ZmZjLWEwZTAtM2ExYWE1NDUwNWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1855325/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chanakya-dwivedi"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"It is not even close to what you will be expecting!!","reviewBody":"I was eagerly looking forward to the 5th installment of this series and I am sorry to say that I have been really let down! Apart from the once in a while visuals, the movie has not been able to get even close to expectations. The first 10 minutes of the movie and you will start feeling disconnected from the movie already not caring at all what is gonna happen in the next scene. After resident evil 3 & 4, I was expecting a lot out of this installment and from Paul W.S. Anderson but he has not been able to live up the mark at all. The action scenes rather than being nail-biting, turned out to be hilarious and funny. There isn't a single moment in the movie where you are actually glued to screen. Milla Jovovich looks pretty as always, but that won't save the movie. All others have done a horrible job with their acting, especially Sienna Guillory. I would say that the only reason you would want to watch this movie is if you are a fan of the resident evil series and you don't mind wasting your money and time for the sake of this series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-09-14","keywords":"zombie,umbrella,corporation,rescue,fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3931415065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0347149/","name":"Sienna Guillory"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
Pravna plavuša 2
programme.desc:
Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde: Directed by Charles Herman-Wurmfeld. With Reese Witherspoon, Sally Field, Regina King, Jennifer Coolidge. Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0333780/","name":"Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwNzExMjk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTUzNDcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0333780/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"3-D"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not good at all.","reviewBody":"Although I recognize the fact that I'm a guy and shouldn't like chick flicks anyway, Legally Blonde 2 was ridiculous on so many levels that after watching the movie I had to lower my head in shame.

The first LB movie, while not very funny, was still entertaining to watch because it actually had effort put into the storyline. It was interesting to see a fashion-obsessed blonde in pink apparently not fitting in at Harvard law school. They tried the same approach with LB2, only with her walking into congress buildings wearing her all pink outfits. However, since we've already seen that attempt at humor in the first movie, it just wasn't anything special.

Aside from that, the plot outline was horrible. Basically, Elle Woods (Witherspoon) is having an upcoming wedding where she plans to invite the mother of her pet dog. She discovers that the dog's mother is in a lab, where they were testing fingernail polish on the dog's nails. Elle got sad and was like 'I am going to go to DC and make it illegal for them to test on animals!' The viewer, however, doesn't really care, realizing that putting nail polish on a dog's nails really isn't that big of a deal, but hey.

I'm not trying to sound mean, but I just can't really think of anything good about this movie. Every single joke used in the movie was either not funny or recycled from the first one. The entire concept of the plot is just retarded. It even seemed Reese was half-assing her acting job through the movie, doing even worse than she did in the first film. Nobody else in the movie will be nominated for any Oscars, either.

It just seemed that some filmmaker wanted to cash in from the first movie's success, knowing that people will pay money to see this movie just because the first one was popular. All of the production team's effort went into marketing and hype and they just didn't put enough into the actual movie itself.

2 out of 10"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64820,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-09-17","keywords":"congresswoman,transvestism,the white house,washington monument washington d.c.,naivete","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2581971225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc2ZjhlYjMtODMxOS00OWE3LWIzMzUtZjJmNzFmNjQ2Zjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc2ZjhlYjMtODMxOS00OWE3LWIzMzUtZjJmNzFmNjQ2Zjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000398/","name":"Sally Field"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0627878/","name":"Bob Newhart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379237/","name":"Charles Herman-Wurmfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093810/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0113005/","name":"Amanda Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0013996/","name":"Eve Ahlert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0236881/","name":"Dennis Drake"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

With Reese Witherspoon, Sally Field, Regina King, Jennifer Coolidge. Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0333780/","name":"Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwNzExMjk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTUzNDcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0333780/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"3-D","dateCreated":"2006-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not good at all.","reviewBody":"Although I recognize the fact that I'm a guy and shouldn't like chick flicks anyway, Legally Blonde 2 was ridiculous on so many levels that after watching the movie I had to lower my head in shame.

The first LB movie, while not very funny, was still entertaining to watch because it actually had effort put into the storyline. It was interesting to see a fashion-obsessed blonde in pink apparently not fitting in at Harvard law school. They tried the same approach with LB2, only with her walking into congress buildings wearing her all pink outfits. However, since we've already seen that attempt at humor in the first movie, it just wasn't anything special.

Aside from that, the plot outline was horrible. Basically, Elle Woods (Witherspoon) is having an upcoming wedding where she plans to invite the mother of her pet dog. She discovers that the dog's mother is in a lab, where they were testing fingernail polish on the dog's nails. Elle got sad and was like 'I am going to go to DC and make it illegal for them to test on animals!' The viewer, however, doesn't really care, realizing that putting nail polish on a dog's nails really isn't that big of a deal, but hey.

I'm not trying to sound mean, but I just can't really think of anything good about this movie. Every single joke used in the movie was either not funny or recycled from the first one. The entire concept of the plot is just retarded. It even seemed Reese was half-assing her acting job through the movie, doing even worse than she did in the first film. Nobody else in the movie will be nominated for any Oscars, either.

It just seemed that some filmmaker wanted to cash in from the first movie's success, knowing that people will pay money to see this movie just because the first one was popular. All of the production team's effort went into marketing and hype and they just didn't put enough into the actual movie itself.

2 out of 10","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64820,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-09-17","keywords":"congresswoman,transvestism,the white house,washington monument washington d.c.,naivete","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2581971225","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc2ZjhlYjMtODMxOS00OWE3LWIzMzUtZjJmNzFmNjQ2Zjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc2ZjhlYjMtODMxOS00OWE3LWIzMzUtZjJmNzFmNjQ2Zjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000398/","name":"Sally Field","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0627878/","name":"Bob Newhart"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379237/","name":"Charles Herman-Wurmfeld"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093810/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0113005/","name":"Amanda Brown","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0013996/","name":"Eve Ahlert","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0236881/","name":"Dennis Drake"],"duration":"PT1H35M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
Cijena straha
programme.desc:
The Sum of All Fears: Directed by Phil Alden Robinson. With Ian Mongrain, Russell Bobbitt, James Cromwell, Ken Jenkins. CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0164184/","name":"The Sum of All Fears","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmFiZDkyYWQtMGNkZi00YmZkLThjNzAtY2U1YTVmYmNlNThmL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Marylan","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0164184/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colan"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"the only good thing I can say about Ben Afleck is...","reviewBody":"Nobody can act like Ben Afleck like Ben Afleck can. I mean, as far as acting like a wooden emotionless awful actor as Ben Afleck is, nobody can act as good (or bad I guess depending how you look at it) as Ben Afleck.

But just making a casting choice of putting one of the worst actors of our times with the most hype of Ben Afleck acting like Ben Afleck (kinda the opposite of how Jack Ryan would be) the rest of the movie is also full of just horrible inaccuracies and goes so far from the book from whence it was adapted, the even call it part of the series is as laughable as calling say Space Balls part of the Star Wars series, only Space Balls was almost good, it certainly had better acting than, say, Ben Afleck. 

Which it's all a shame, it's clearly a big budget piece, the backdrops and some of the actors excepting the stereotypical, laughably bad Neo Nazis which, what a stupid choice to do considering the book's bad guys would be much more relevant in todays world (what the heck was Hollywood thinking?!?), you could feel the money being dropped into this clunker. Granted, it's not 100% laughably bad like, say, most movies Matthew McConaughey is in lately, say the uberly so bad even the actors were laughing at their lines "Sahara," I mean, that's a steaming pile of a movie there were it reeks of bad. This movie reeked of trying to be good but with a "leading man" (sic) choice like weak pathetic Afleck, then changing the story from the book, then implausibles about nukes and radiation, this flick devolved into one big "you've got to kidding me fest."

I'd give this movie a zero except the explosion and some of the hardware and aircraft looked cool, that and sadly IMDb doesn't, but should, allow zeros, and should go one step further and automatically give any movie Ben Afleck is in a zero."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":111755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-08-28","keywords":"nuclear explosion,nuclear bomb,nuclear threat,atomic bomb,russia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Sum of All Fears","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3270770969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDNmNmRlNTYtMGFmYy00YmJiLThkODYtNWMwYWQwN2ZjOGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDNmNmRlNTYtMGFmYy00YmJiLThkODYtNWMwYWQwN2ZjOGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Sum of All Fears"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1172817/","name":"Ian Mongrain"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004675/","name":"Phil Alden Robinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026101/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067370/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002007/","name":"Tom Clancy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002417/","name":"Daniel Pyne"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator
Alien protiv Predatora - Requiem
programme.desc: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem: Directed by Colin Strause, Greg Strause. With Steven Pasquale, Reiko Aylesworth, John Ortiz, Johnny Lewis. Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0758730/","name":"AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5NDY2NDUwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzQxMTA3._V1_.jpg","description":"Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758730/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AaronCapenBanner"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"What Did You Expect Would Happen?","reviewBody":"If the Aliens ever got loose on Earth, I fully expect them to create the exact kind of havoc and destruction that they perform here, and some of it is gruesome indeed(the hospital for instance...) so since many fans wanted to see the Aliens on Earth, filmmakers granted them their wish, and what did they get back...lots of hate! I may be one of the few that liked this second(possibly last?!) AVP film, which picks up right where the previous film ended, with the Alien infested Predator ship crashing to Earth, unleashing Alien hordes on an unsuspecting and secluded Colorado town. A veteran Predator is then dispatched to Earth to clean up the mess, and cover up their involvement.\n\nI admit that the cast of unknowns may not grab you, but they are still reasonably interesting, and come off realistically, with elements that parallel earlier films in the series. Lots of good action, and plenty of scares, though I admit it is(literally) too dark at times, but then it is set at night in the rain! Much better than believed, and an ending that gives a nice bit of continuity for the fans...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2008-01-02","keywords":"predator,the predator character,murder of a pregnant woman,extraterrestrial,weapons fire","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi682754329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4MzQ4Njc5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTIxODMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4MzQ4Njc5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTIxODMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043855/","name":"Reiko Aylesworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1018679/","name":"Steven Pasquale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1560274/","name":"Shareeka Epps"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833779/","name":"Colin Strause"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833780/","name":"Greg Strause"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132161/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004307/","name":"Shane Salerno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639321/","name":"Dan O'Bannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795953/","name":"Ronald Shusett"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0758730, Title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator, --- Description: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem: Directed by Colin Strause, Greg Strause. With Steven Pasquale, Reiko Aylesworth, John Ortiz, Johnny Lewis. Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0758730/","name":"AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5NDY2NDUwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzQxMTA3._V1_.jpg","description":"Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758730/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"AaronCapenBanner","dateCreated":"2013-08-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"What Did You Expect Would Happen?","reviewBody":"If the Aliens ever got loose on Earth, I fully expect them to create the exact kind of havoc and destruction that they perform here, and some of it is gruesome indeed(the hospital for instance...) so since many fans wanted to see the Aliens on Earth, filmmakers granted them their wish, and what did they get back...lots of hate! I may be one of the few that liked this second(possibly last?!) AVP film, which picks up right where the previous film ended, with the Alien infested Predator ship crashing to Earth, unleashing Alien hordes on an unsuspecting and secluded Colorado town. A veteran Predator is then dispatched to Earth to clean up the mess, and cover up their involvement.\n\nI admit that the cast of unknowns may not grab you, but they are still reasonably interesting, and come off realistically, with elements that parallel earlier films in the series. Lots of good action, and plenty of scares, though I admit it is(literally) too dark at times, but then it is set at night in the rain! Much better than believed, and an ending that gives a nice bit of continuity for the fans...","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2008-01-02","keywords":"predator,the predator character,murder of a pregnant woman,extraterrestrial,weapons fire","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi682754329","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4MzQ4Njc5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTIxODMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4MzQ4Njc5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTIxODMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043855/","name":"Reiko Aylesworth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1018679/","name":"Steven Pasquale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1560274/","name":"Shareeka Epps"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833779/","name":"Colin Strause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833780/","name":"Greg Strause"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132161/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004307/","name":"Shane Salerno","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639321/","name":"Dan O'Bannon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795953/","name":"Ronald Shusett"],"duration":"PT1H34M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Normandia: Misioni i fundit
programme.desc: Lufta II Botërore: Pasi forcat aleate zbarkuan në Normandi kundër Nazistëve, tri ushtarë amerikanë dhe dy infermiere të ushtrisë u bllokuan pas vijës së armikut. Ata marrin peng një oficer gjerman dhe përpiqen të planifikojnë arratisjen.
programme.category: Luftë
Dramë

programme.title: Lufta e shigjetave
programme.desc: Gjatë pushtimit të dytë Mançurian në Kore, harkëtari më i mirë korean përballet me një ushtri të tërë, në përpjekje për të shpëtuar të motrën, e cila rrëmbehet dhe merret peng nga pushtuesit...
programme.category: Aksion
epik

programme.title: Dosjet Kein
programme.desc: Drew Fuller, William Atherton. Pasi arratiset nga burgu, një njeri kërkon hakmarrje kundër gangsterit që e do të vdekur me çdo kusht.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Çakalli
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Richard Gere. Një vrasës gjakftohtë, mjeshtër i maskimit është pajtuar për të asgjesuar një anëtar të lartë të qeverisë. I vetmi që mund të ndihmojë në kapjen e tij është një terrorist që gjendet pas hekurave të burgut.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në kërkim të gurit të çmuar 2
programme.desc: M.Douglas, K.Turner. 6 muaj pas aventurës së parë, Xhoanës i caktohet të shkruajë një biografi mbi sundimtarin e lig të një shkretëtire, por ajo futet në telashe në kërkim të një guri të çmuar dhe Xhek Koltoni i vjen sërish në ndihmë.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Prapa vijës së armikut 2
programme.desc: Matt Bushell, Shane Edelman, Keith David. Disa ushtarë specialë të dërguar në Korenë e Veriut, me një mision për të shkatërruar një reaktor nuklear, duhet të luftojnë për të shpëtuar veten e tyre dhe botën.
programme.category: Boshti i së keqes

programme.title: Marrëveshje e pistë
programme.desc: A. Schwarzenegger. Pasi dëbohet nga radhët e FBI-se, ai perfundon sherif në një qytet të vogel. Por një pakt i rrezikshëm premton ta rikthejë në krye të detyrës. Në fshehtësi do të futet mes boseve të krimit, duke rrezikuar gjithçka.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Star Trek III: Kërkim per Spokut
programme.desc: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy. Kapiteni Kirk, e ka mundur famëkeqin Khan, por me një çmim të hidhur. Miku i tij, Spock ka vdekur dhe kapiteni do të thyejë rregullat për të udhëtuar drejt një planeti të largët, që të gjejë trupin e tij.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
aksion

programme.title: Katër Fantastikët
programme.desc: 2015. Miles Teller, Kate Mara. 4 të rinj teleportohen në një univers alternativ të rrezikshëm, nga ku marrin aftësi fizike tronditëse . Ata duhet të mësojne si t'i përdorin fuqitë e reja për të shpëtuar Tokën nga një shok i kthyer në armik.
programme.category: Aksion
Fantashkencë

programme.title: Kodi i Merkurit
programme.desc: Bruce Willis në rolin e një agjenti te FBI që ka për detyrë të mbrojë një gjeni të vogël 9-vjeçar me autizëm i cili kërkohet nga vrasesit pas zbërthimit të një kodi qeveritar tepër sekret.
programme.category: Bruce Willis

programme.title: Luftëtarët e së nesërmes
programme.desc: Caitlin Stasey, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Lincoln Lewis. Pasi vendi i tyre pushtohet nga një ushtri e huaj dhe familjet merren peng, një grup adoleshentësh bashkojnë forcat për të luftuar me të gjitha mënyrat...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Princi i Persisë
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal, Gemma Arterton. Në Persinë e lashtë një princ në arrati bashkon forcat me një princeshë misterioze për të mbrojtur një shpatë magjike, që ka fuqinë të kthejë kohën pas dhe në duart e gabuara mund të sjellë fundin e botës.

programme.title: Dashuri me shikim të parë
programme.desc: Një balerinë e re ngarkohet të mësojë ish-beqarin më të lakmuar të Manhatanit se si të vallëzojë në dasmën e tij ekstravagante. Por ndërsa mësimet e vallëzimit përparojnë rrjedhshëm, situata ndërlikohet kur ndjenjat lindin mes tyre.

programme.title: Një i huaj në shtëpi
programme.desc: Emily Ratajkowski, Aaron Paul, Riccardo Scamarcio. Një çift merr me qira një vilë në Itali me shpresën për të përmirësuar marrëdhëniet e tyre të dëmtuar, por pronari i pashëm dhe djallëzor i shtëpisë duket sikur ka plane të tjera për ta.
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: Lojë kukullash
programme.desc: Një riprodhim bashkëkohor i horrorit klasik të viteve '80. Aubrey Plaza. Kur një nënë beqare i dhuron të birit një kukull të teknologjisë së lartë të quajtur Çaki, një seri ngjarjesh të tmerrshme shpalosen rreth tyre.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Piti dhe dragoi
programme.desc: Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford. Një riprodhim i historisë shumë të pëlqyer nga Disney. Aventurat e Pitit, një djaloshi jetim dhe mikut të tij më të mirë Eliot, që çuditërishtështë një dragua...
programme.category: Aventurë/Fantazi

programme.title: Përpara se të iki
programme.desc: 12 shkurti, është thjesht një ditë tjetër për Samantën, derisa kuptohet se është dita e saj e fundit. E bllokuar për të ripërjetuar ditën e fundit, ajo duhet të zbulojë misterin e vdekjes dhe gjithçka që po humbet përpara se të iki.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Zbërthimi
programme.desc: Noomi Rapace, Orlando Bloom, John Malkovich, Toni Collette. Kur një agjente e CIA-as i jep informacione sekrete pa e ditur terroristëve, ajo do të vihet në garë me kohën për të shpëtuar qytetarët e Londrës nga një sulm biologjik...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: E zezë dhe blu
programme.desc: Naomie Harris. Kur kamera e saj regjistron policë të korruptuar që vrasin tregtar droge, një police fillestare afro-amerikane përpiqet të tregojë të vërtetën ndërsa arratiset nga kriminelë që duan hakmarrje dhe policë që duan të fshijnë provat.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Projekti Binjakët
programme.desc: Will Smith, Clive Owen. Henri Brogan është një vrasës elitar në pension, i cili papritmas vihet nën shenjestër dhe përndiqet nga një operativ i ri misterioz, që duket se është i aftë të parashikojë çdo lëvizje të tij.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Aplikacioni i vdekjes
programme.desc: Një infermiere e re shkarkon një aplikacion në celularin e saj, që i tregon se i mbeten vetëm 3 ditë për të jetuar. Me kohën që kalon shpejt dhe vdekjen që afrohet, ajo duhet të shpëtojë jetën e saj para se të jetë shumë vonë.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Shoku im spiun
programme.desc: Dave Bautista. Një operativ profesionist i CIA-s e gjen veten në mëshirën e një 9-vjeçareje të zgjuar të quajtur Sofia, pasi dërgohet për të vëzhguar familjen e saj në fshehtësi...
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: Shtëpia në plazh
programme.desc: Emily dhe Randall arratisen në shtëpinë e plazhit për të kaluar kohë së bashku. Pushimi i tyre ndërpritet nga një çift të moshuarish, me të cilët pranojnë të ndajnë shtëpinë. Por papritur gjithçka merr një kthesë ogurzezë...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: E bukura dhe Bisha
programme.desc: Historia dhe karakteret aq shumë të dashur nga të gjithë, vijnë në një riprodhim të mrekullushëm nga Disney, me Emma Watson në rolin e bukuroshes dhe Dan Stevens në rolin e bishës.
programme.category: Fantazi
romancë
muzikë

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: 2017. Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart. Në të ardhmen e afërt, Logan i lodhur nga vite luftimesh e arratie, kujdeset për profesorin X në fshehtësi. Por bota e tyre kthehet përmbys kur një vajzë e re mutante kërkon ndihmën e tyre për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Aventurë në galaktikë
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Tony Shalhoub. Parodi e sagës "Startrek". Disa aktorë që vite më parë ishin pjesë e një serial fantastiko-shkencor, duhet të ndihmojnë një racë jashtëtokësorësh, që mendojnë se ata janë heronj të vërtetë.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Vuajtjet e dashurisë
programme.desc: Dy çifte përjetojnë një krizë emocionesh dhe lidhjet e tyre vihen në sprovë kur tradhtia kthehet në pasqyrë të brishtësisë emocionale që shkakton situata tragjikomike dhe vuajtje...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Vëllezërit Blum
programme.desc: Rachel Weisz, Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo. Ata janë vëllezërit Blum, mashtrues, që zhvasin pasanikët. Tani, ata kanë marrë përsipër dhe një punë të fundit - të mashtrojnë një trashëgimtare bukuroshe që s'ka dalë kurrë nga shtëpia...
programme.category: Komedi
aventurë

programme.title: Jo pushime... por rrëmujë
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd, John Candy. Dikush pret të kalojë disa pushime të paqta me familjen në pyll, por qetësia i prishet nga pjesa tjetër e familjes që i vjen papritur për vizitë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Togeri Bilko
programme.desc: Steve Martin. Togeri Bilko është përgjegjësi i një baze ushtarake, ku mundësitë e argëtimit s'mungojnë. Kur një armik i vjetër vjen për kontroll, ai do të shpalosë gjithë aftësitë e tij për të sabotuar etjen e tjetrit për hakmarje.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Nga bankier në gangster
programme.desc: José Garcia. Një bankier i qetë, detyrohet të marrë pamjen e një gangsteri të regjur, për të ndihmuar policinë në eliminimin e një bande kriminelësh.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Fqinjët e pazakontë
programme.desc: T.Hanks. Ray Peterson është bërë fare histerik. Shkak për këte janë bërë fqinjët e rinj, qe janë të çuditshëm, s'dalin kurrë, shtëpia e tyre është rrëmujë dhe nga bodrumi i saj dëgjohen zhurma të habitshme. Dihet vetëm se ata quhen Klopeks.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Producentët
programme.desc: Nathan Lane, Matthew Broderick. Max Bialystock, ish-producenti i suksesshëm teatri, do t'i kthehet sërish karierës. Por paratë dhe suksesi jo gjithmonë e bëjnë rrugën bashkë. Bialystock do të zgjedhë këtë herë paratë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Kushëriri im Vini
programme.desc: Dy djem të rinj, rrugës per ne kolegj, arrestohen dhe akuzohen gabimisht per vrasje. Njeri prej tyre ka nje kusheri avokat, i cili vjen me urgjence nga Nju Jorku. Per te eshte çeshtja e pare gjyqesore. Per ta, shansi i vetem per te shpetuar.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mirë se vini në Veri
programme.desc: Filmi që ka thyer çdo rekord të të ardhurave në Francë! Një menaxher poste, detyrohet të transferohet nga jugu i rehatshëm e me klimë perfekte i Francës, në veriun e mërzitshëm dhe zbulon se asgjë nga ato që ka dëgjuar s'është e vërtetë...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Bebe surprizë
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2009. Heather Graham, Jerry O'Connell. Një çift i lumtur me një të ardhme të ndritur zbulon se do të kenë një fëmijë, duke filluar kështu një aventurë nëntë mujore të pabesueshme.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Garë e çmendur
programme.desc: Nje klient i rregullt kazinosh ne Las Vegas, i vendosur per te gjetur nje menyre te re per te vene baste, organizon nje gare me para.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Unë, vetja ime dhe Irena
programme.desc: Jim Carrey, Renée Zellweger. Çarli, një polic me personalitet të dyfishtë, duhet të mbrojë një vajzë që arratiset nga ish i dashuri i saj. Çdo gjë do të ecte mirë, sikur alter-egoja e tij Henku, s'do të shfaqej kur s'duhej...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Tre amigos
programme.desc: Steve Martin, Chevy Chase, Martin Short. Ata janë tre aktorë të papunë që do të pranojnë të luajne banditët në një fshat Meksikan, pa e ditur që gjithçka është e vërtetë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zeniti i Shangait
programme.desc: 2000. Princesha e bukur Pei Pei eshte rrembyer. Gjurmet e rrembyesve shkojne ne Nevaden e larget. Chon Wang, roja perandorake eshte gati te shkoje deri ne fund te botes qe t'ia ktheje Pei Pei te atit Perandor!
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mr. Bean në udhëtim
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Mr. Bean, pjesët më të mira
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Shkolla më e bukur në botë
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Rocco Papaleo. Një shkëmbim klasash, mes një shkolle të shkëlqyer nga veriu i Italisë, me një klase Afrikane shkon keq... Prej një gabimi në internet, shkëmbimi bëhet me një nga shkollat më të keqija nga Napoli...
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Film pa zë
programme.desc: Mel Brooks. Parodi e filmave pa zë. Një regjisor, karriera e të cilit ka perënduar, kërkon të realizojë një film pa zë edhe pse ka mbi 40 vjet që nuk prodhohen më.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Zjarrfikësit 2
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio, Massimo Boldi, Christian De Sica. Skuadra 17, rikthehet me aventura të reja. Tashmë ata janë zjarrfikës të vërtetë, por ama nuk i kanë lënë pas gabimet dhe keqkuptimet...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Të dua Beth Kuper
programme.desc: Gjatë fjalimit në marrjen e diplomave, Denis një adoleshent jo shumë popullor i shpreh dashurinë vajzës më të bukur të shkollës, Beth Kuper. E prekur nga fjalimi, ajo vendos ta ftojë atë për të kaluar një natë plot argëtim e aventura.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Ankormeni
programme.desc: Ron Burungundy eshte kthyer ne legjende ne San Diego. Sipas tij, gruaja e ka vendin ne kuzhine! Ndonjera qe guxon t'i thote vetes gazetare, le te merret me shfaqjen e modes, me rubriken e gatimit dhe kaq!
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Para se djalli ta dijë qe vdiqe
programme.desc: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ethan Hawke, Marisa Tomei. Me mendimin se do të ishte shumë e thjeshtë, dy vëllezër planifikojnë të vjedhin dyqanin e prindërve të tyre. Por kur plani nuk shkon ashtu si duhet, pasojat do të jenë shkatërruese...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Ortaku
programme.desc: T.Cruise, J.Tripplehorn, G.Hackman Një avokat i ri , i përgatitur dhe ambicioz, pas shumë ofertash do të bëhet ortak në një firmë të rëndësishme avokatore vetëm për të zbuluar se ka zgjedhur anën e errët të drejtësisë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: E paimagjinueshme
programme.desc: 2017. Nicolas Cage, Gina Gershon, Nicky Whelan. Një çift strehon një nënë të re, e cila po përpiqet t'i shpëtojë të kaluarës së saj, pa e ditur se ajo fsheh një sekret të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Uniforma blu
programme.desc: Kurt Russell, Ving Rhames. Në Amerikë policia është e vendosur të zbatojë ligjin dhe të mbrojë jetët e pafajshme. Një skuadër speciale e departamentit të policisë së Los Anxhelosit i vihet pas një vëllazërie super të kërkuar kriminelesh.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Foto depërtuese
programme.desc: Pas një aksidenti tragjik, një çift fotografësh shohin në fotot e tyre shpirtrat e të vdekurve. Me frikën se imazhet janë të lidhura me aksidentin, ata do të hetojnë, por zbulojnë se disa mistere nuk duhen zgjidhur kurrë.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Dosjet X
programme.desc: David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson. Dy agjentët e F.B.I-së, Fox Mudler dhe Dana Scully, hetojnë ngjarje që mund të provojnë se jashtëtokësorët gjenden në tokë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Këneta
programme.desc: Diana Glenn, Maeve Dermody, Andy Rodoreda. Bazuar në një ngjarje të vërtetë! Tre njerëz do të përjetojnë makthin më të madh të jetës, kur izolohen nga një krokodil gjigant në një kënetë të Australisë së Veriut.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Ajër
programme.desc: Norman Reedus, Djimon Hounsou. Në të ardhmen e afërt, oksigjeni në Tokë nuk ekziston dhe 2 inxhinierë të ngarkuar me misionin e ruajtes së shpresës së fundit të njerëzimit, rrezikojnë të shkatërrojnë njëri-tjetrin...
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Trilogjia Uorriker - Faqja 8
programme.desc: Bill Nighy, Rachel Weisz. Pas vdekjes së shefit të tij, një agjent i MI5-ës, gjen një dosje misterioze që kërcënon sigurinë e gjithë agjencisë...
programme.category: Thriller politik

programme.title: Dëshmitarja e rreme
programme.desc: Një ngjarje tronditëse lë pasoja në mendjen e një dëshmitareje, që reflektohet edhe në dëshminë e saj në gjyq. E dëshpëruar për ndihmë, ajo i drejtohet një psikologu jotradicional, i cili është vetë i konsumuar nga ngjarjet e të kaluarës...
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Deadpool
Deadpool
programme.desc:
Deadpool: Directed by Tim Miller. With Ryan Reynolds, Karan Soni, Ed Skrein, Michael Benyaer. A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1431045/","name":"Deadpool","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzE5MjY1ZDgtMTkyNC00MTMyLThhMjAtZGI5OTE1NzFlZGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1431045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy"},"dateCreated":"2016-02-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is what it looks like when filmmakers take risks","reviewBody":"Deadpool is a triumph of artistic vision over studio interference. Little credit should be given to 20th Century Fox, as they had zero faith in the success of a Deadpool movie. To put things into perspective, Ryan Reynolds fought for this film back in 2004 when Blade: Trinity was released. Reynolds and co. went to shoot test footage that was then leaked online by Reynolds because Fox had no intentions to release it to the public. Finally, after years and years of BEGGING to the studio and the overwhelming positive responses of the test footage from the public, Fox didn't even tell Reynolds and co. that the film was greenlit. They had to find out online like the rest of us plebeians. If that sounds bad, Fox even cut their budget by $7 million AT THE LAST MINUTE, which caused the writers to scratch some action sequences that I'm sure would've been great to see.

Deadpool now has the biggest opening weekend in the month of February (surpassing Fifty Shades of Grey), the biggest opening weekend for 20th Century Fox (surpassing all the X-Men films), and the biggest opening weekend for an R rated film EVER (surpassing The Matrix: Reloaded). With all that being said, Deadpool is a hilariously entertaining film that works mainly because of Reynolds himself. His comedic skills pay off gloriously as the titular character, who gives so many quips in one instance that some jokes will be missed. Of course, credit should be given to the writers too (AKA: The Real Heroes Here), and it's impressive that this is Tim Miller's directorial debut. The action sequences and pacing are so good that you'd think this came from a veteran director.

From the ingenious opening credits to the subversive ending, Deadpool constantly upends clichés and tropes you're used to seeing in superhero flicks in the past few years. What's great here is the filmmakers had something weird and perverse and just went with it. Jokes about pedophilia, pegging, and sex run rampant, but it's never really dark, despite the mature subject matter. On top of that, it's also very refreshing to see a pansexual superhero in such a big studio film. It's unheard of these days. Fox and other studios, learn from this success. It's not the fact that a hard R-rated film can do well, it's that Deadpool also happens to be very good, most likely because you, Fox, actually gave the filmmakers the creative freedom to do whatever the hell they wanted.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":958120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2016-02-17","keywords":"breaking the fourth wall,anti hero,sex scene,mercenary,revenge","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Even-More-Voiced-Over Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi567457049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0Nzk0NzAzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk1Njg5NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0Nzk0NzAzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk1Njg5NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A groundbreaking 4th wall breaking trailer breakdown of a character who breaks the 4th wall, including extra voice-over on a trailer that includes a voice-over. 8 walls + 4 breaks + 2 voice overs = 1 game-changing superhero."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. Miller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1783265/","name":"Tim Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tomorrow Never Dies
Sutra nikada ne umire
programme.desc:
Tomorrow Never Dies: Directed by Roger Spottiswoode. With Pierce Brosnan, Jonathan Pryce, Michelle Yeoh, Teri Hatcher. James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120347/","name":"Tomorrow Never Dies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1MTk2ODQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTY5MDg0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond sets out to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120347/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ivo-cobra8"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"My seventh favorite James Bond 007 movie Pierce Brosnan second best movie","reviewBody":"Tomorrow Never Dies (1997) is my seventh favorite James Bond 007 movie and Pierce Brosnan second best movie he did in my opinion. It is not better than GoldenEye but it is good decent action movie with great explosions, dangerous stunts and great action. Who is my favorite James Bond 007? That will definitely be Pierce Brosnan no one else, since his first film GoldenEye. I saw this movie as a fifteen year old teen I even have a poster at home from this movie. I love this movie I thought Roger Spottiswoode did a good job directing it. I thought it had decent stunts, decent action, less humor than Roger Moore. If you agree with me good, if you disagree with me that is your opinion. Tomorrow Never Dies is the 18th entry in the official James Bond film series.

Pierce Brosnan makes his second appearance as Agent 007, James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage. 

I love the opening scene in which in Russia Bond steals airplane with military missals and weapons who are been sold to international terrorist and brings them home. We see Pierce Brosnan flying an airplane. In real life Pierce Brosnan was scared of that airplane he thought the crew will killed him. You have a beautiful explosions from those airplanes. In Hamburg, Germany Bond breaks into the headquarters of Carver's media company and finds the office occupied by Henry Gupta, Carver's communications specialist and known techno-terrorist. He is been chased from security guys, because Wai Lin (Michelle Yeoh) makes entry and she touches the alarm. Bond is being fired by machine guns in which he flees great action sequences.

Bond drives a new car BMW 7 Series with a remote control on a cell phone Ericson. I miss those times in which we used Ericsson cell phone. In 2004 I had that phone for a year until it got broken and I had to buy a new phone. Bond with cell phone drives with his cell phone as a remotely without touching the steering wheel. I did read a complaint about this scene on IMDb that is not realistic and it shouldn't have been in this movie. Listen folks it is a fiction not realistic, it James Bond so who cares. I never mind that scene it was great action sequence in which Bond eluded his attackers and he drove his car off the wall ha ha.

James Bond and Wai Lin in Saigon, Vietnam jumped off the building in Carver's HQ. They escaped Carver's henchman and the flee off the building. They slide down Carver's poster while been handcuffed. Great action sequence in which Pierce Brosnan and Michele Yeoh drove handcuff on a motorcycle. That was incredible dangerous stunt. I read Michelle Yeoh did her own stunt on the motorcycle and it was really painful too sit on that bike her legs and body hurt her. Cars and helicopter chased them until they hanker the helicopter and it explodes. Practical effect real explosion no CGI or shaky cam real action. Bond in Vietnam that was interested story well done acted. 

Bond on the ship a stealth craft that is invisible on the radar uses hand grenade and he actives with his watch the grenade explodes and he makes the ship visible on the radar. Bond kick's ass and he kill's on the end Carver. He throws Carver in to the sea drill excellent. Bond is fired with machine guns and he fires back killing several Carver's man.

Jonathan Pryce plays a good memorable villain, 'the emperor of the air,' Elliot Carver who was prepared to go to any length to increase the power of his media empire. If you think actor Jonathan Pryce did not a good job playing a bad guy. Watch him Ronin (1998) with Robert De Niro a year after this movie he played another bad guy.

Götz Otto plays Stamper, the loyal psychopath henchman who follows Carver's orders murdering a group of shipwrecked British sailors. He was a good second bad guy but he wasn't memorable like Famke Janssen as Xenia Onatopp.

Judi Dench is once again as M and she is more handsome and awesome than she was in GoldenEye. She is a good heart person in this movie I thought the actress did her job well. Samantha Bond, Joe Don Baker and Desmond Llewellyn - all reprise their "GoldenEye" roles.

Michelle Yeoh did a good job as Wai Lin the new Bond girl she was awarded for the role of Wai Lin. A martial artist of considerable skills, she preferred to work alone - until she begins to trust 007.

Carver's wife Paris was played by the great beauty, Teri Hatcher was excellent as Paris Carver's wife. She was good in her role and her performance. After an assassin kill's Carver's wife here we seen Bond's remorse and feelings, not a stone killer like Daniel Craig in Quantum of Solace.

Tomorrow Never Dies (1997) is the eighteenth spy film in the James Bond series to be produced by Eon Productions, and the second to star Pierce Brosnan as the fictional MI6 agent James Bond. Directed by Roger Spottiswoode, with the screenplay written by Bruce Feirstein.

10/10 Great Bond theme, it is my seventh favorite James Bond 007 movie in top ten favorite Bond films. I love this film to death and in my opinion it is way underrated.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":188805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-12-12","keywords":"official james bond series,megalomaniac,media tycoon,world war three,ex boyfriend ex girlfriend relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What to Watch While You Wait for 'No Time to Die'","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3602956569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzZGFiMzQtMjlkYy00MmU4LTlmZjctZDVmOWRjYmExZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWplZmZscA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzZGFiMzQtMjlkYy00MmU4LTlmZjctZDVmOWRjYmExZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWplZmZscA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"If the wait for 'No Time to Die' feels endless, we have three titles to make the time go by, including a heist film where Daniel Craig delivers both the action and delightful puns, a classic Bond title where the women don't pull any punches, and a trippy miniseries from 'No Time to Die' director Cary Joji Fukunaga."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000596/","name":"Jonathan Pryce"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000706/","name":"Michelle Yeoh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006854/","name":"Roger Spottiswoode"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0270761/","name":"Bruce Feirstein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001220/","name":"Ian Fleming"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

Jonathan Pryce plays a good memorable villain, 'the emperor of the air,' Elliot Carver who was prepared to go to any length to increase the power of his media empire. If you think actor Jonathan Pryce did not a good job playing a bad guy. Watch him Ronin (1998) with Robert De Niro a year after this movie he played another bad guy.

Götz Otto plays Stamper, the loyal psychopath henchman who follows Carver's orders murdering a group of shipwrecked British sailors. He was a good second bad guy but he wasn't memorable like Famke Janssen as Xenia Onatopp.

Judi Dench is once again as M and she is more handsome and awesome than she was in GoldenEye. She is a good heart person in this movie I thought the actress did her job well. Samantha Bond, Joe Don Baker and Desmond Llewellyn - all reprise their "GoldenEye" roles.

Michelle Yeoh did a good job as Wai Lin the new Bond girl she was awarded for the role of Wai Lin. A martial artist of considerable skills, she preferred to work alone - until she begins to trust 007.

Carver's wife Paris was played by the great beauty, Teri Hatcher was excellent as Paris Carver's wife. She was good in her role and her performance. After an assassin kill's Carver's wife here we seen Bond's remorse and feelings, not a stone killer like Daniel Craig in Quantum of Solace.

Tomorrow Never Dies (1997) is the eighteenth spy film in the James Bond series to be produced by Eon Productions, and the second to star Pierce Brosnan as the fictional MI6 agent James Bond. Directed by Roger Spottiswoode, with the screenplay written by Bruce Feirstein.

10/10 Great Bond theme, it is my seventh favorite James Bond 007 movie in top ten favorite Bond films. I love this film to death and in my opinion it is way underrated.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":188805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-12-12","keywords":"official james bond series,megalomaniac,media tycoon,world war three,ex boyfriend ex girlfriend relationship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What to Watch While You Wait for 'No Time to Die'","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3602956569","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzZGFiMzQtMjlkYy00MmU4LTlmZjctZDVmOWRjYmExZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWplZmZscA@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzZGFiMzQtMjlkYy00MmU4LTlmZjctZDVmOWRjYmExZGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWplZmZscA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"If the wait for 'No Time to Die' feels endless, we have three titles to make the time go by, including a heist film where Daniel Craig delivers both the action and delightful puns, a classic Bond title where the women don't pull any punches, and a trippy miniseries from 'No Time to Die' director Cary Joji Fukunaga.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000596/","name":"Jonathan Pryce","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000706/","name":"Michelle Yeoh"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006854/","name":"Roger Spottiswoode"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0270761/","name":"Bruce Feirstein","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001220/","name":"Ian Fleming"],"duration":"PT1H59M"</script><metacontent="
